summary: A contemporary David and Goliath story that takes you inside the cutthroat world of the big business of American beer.
cast: Norman Adami|Anat Baron|Roberta Baskin|Jeff Becker|Simon Bergson|John Boehner|John Bryant|Betty Buck|August Busch III|August Busch IV|August Busch Jr.|Sam Calagione|Peter A. DeFazio|George Hacker|Steve Hoch|Kim Jordan|Rhonda Kallman|Greg Koch|Jim Koch|Bob Lachky|Dennis Long|Diane Matagrano|Chris O'Brien|Maureen Ogle|Garrett Oliver|Charlie Papazian|David Rehr|John Serbia|Jim Shpall|Marc Sorini|Benj Steinman|Carol Stoudt|Frits van Paasschen|Dick Yuengling
title: Beer Wars
